channel.title: Pages on this is rob dyke dot com

item.title: About
item.description: 30,000 hours of open source hackery, 10,000 of them in health and care tech. I co-founded a tech company that created open eObs and made NHoS / NHSbuntu - an OS for the NHS. These days I research the security and privacy of apps listed in the NHS Apps Library. I registered robdyke.com on the 19th August 2000. I started blogging in 2004. Amalgated here are the all the posts Iâ€™ve written since.
